history.proof: intros a b P x H. unfold slicef in *. destruct (slice a b P) eqn:EQ. - shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros a b P x H.
exceptions.exn: Tactic failure: The relation (In (A:=poly A0 eqA ltM)) is not a declared reflexive relation. Maybe you need to require the Coq.Classes.RelationClasses library.

ctx: intros a b P x H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), incl (slicef a b P) P

Premises:

CombLinear_mults1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p)
canonical_spminusf_full_t : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q))
spolyf_pO : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (a : list (Term A n)) (Ca : canonical A0 eqA ltM a), eqP A eqA n (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a a Ca Ca) (pO A n)

CombLinear_id : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
CombLinear_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM p

Rminus_is_reduceplus : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (Rminus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a nZa p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) r)
reduce_in_pO : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (pO A n)

```coq
intros a b P x H.
unfold slicef in *.
destruct (slice a b P) eqn:EQ.
- reflexivity.
- inversion H.
```

original: intros a b P x H. unfold slicef in *. destruct (slice a b P) eqn:EQ. - reflexivity. - inversion H.
